content:
REVISED FOR APPEARANCE
ITEM NO.3               COURT NO.13               SECTION II-B
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Petition(s) for Special Leave to Appeal (Crl.)  No(s).  9499/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  12-05-2025
in CRM-M No. 23687/2025 passed by the High Court of Punjab & 
Haryana at Chandigarh]
SANJEEV KUMAR                                      Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
STATE OF UT CHANDIGARH                             Respondent(s)
IA No. 150975/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING C/C OF THE IMPUGNED 
JUDGMENT
IA No. 150976/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
 
Date : 04-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM : 
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE MANOJ MISRA
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE NONGMEIKAPAM KOTISWAR SINGH
(PARTIAL COURT  WORKING DAYS BENCH)
For Petitioner(s) : 
                   Mr. Saurabh Bajaj, Adv.
                   Ms. Ashwarya Bajaj, Adv.
                   Mr. Sachin Pahwa, Adv.
                   Mrs. Parampreet Kaur Pahwa, Adv.
                   Mr. Rameshwar Prasad Goyal, AOR
    Mr./Ms. Manpreet, Adv.
                   
                   
For Respondent(s) : 
         UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                        O R D E R
Issue notice, returnable within three weeks. 
Liberty  to  serve  the  standing   counsel
representing   the  State  of  UT,  Chandigarh,  is
granted.
(SONIA BHASIN)
ASSISTANT REGISTRAR-CUM-PS
  (AVGV RAMU)
